AD_ImpWardGreeting.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee. This AD will be played when player clicks on the ward and opens combo UI.It resembles the head of the imp or the devil.When the player resolves the puzzle by combining this head device with any liquid bottle ward disables the trap.
AD_ImpWardGreeting.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Click on the head of the devil.

AD_ImpWardSolved.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee.It resembles the head of the imp or the devil.When the player resolves the puzzle by combining this head device with any liquid bottle ward disables the trap and throws this AD. It will repeat it when clicked.
AD_ImpWardSolved.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Click on the head, place water bottle or any drink into combo UI, click combine.

AD_ImpWardLaughing.synopsis: This is dialogue played by the ward device placed on the wall in Devil's Fee. This AD will be played when player enters the trap and trap explodes.This will be played every time the explosion happens which is repeated.
AD_ImpWardLaughing.how_to_trigger: CTY_Main_AGoto -47 11Enter the area near the door.

AD_ImpWardGreeting_0.text: Gravelled tongue, sanded throat. Hard to swallow... hurts to breathe...
AD_ImpWardGreeting_0.context: NodeContext: INCREDIBLY thirsty, tongue is just sticking to the rough of his mouth, gasping for a drink of ANYTHING

AD_ImpWardSolved_0.text: Too wet. Too cold. No fun. Begone!
AD_ImpWardSolved_0.context: NodeContext: Annoyed, like a child that's had its toy ripped out of its hands

AD_ImpWardLaughing_0.text: Is it warm in here? Or is it HOT.
AD_ImpWardLaughing_0.context: NodeContext: Delighted in a gleeful way, then very sinister on 'Now burn'
